name: Zincum oxydatum
details: Nausea and sour taste. Sudden vomiting in children. Vomiting of bile and diarrhoea. Flatulent abdomen. Watery stools with tenemus. Debility after grip. Fiery red face, GREAT DROWSINESS with dreamlike unrefreshing sleep. Similar to effect of night watching. Mental and physical exertion Rademacher.
